short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share the screen with one click. Share entire screen or a specific browser tab with this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share the screen with one click. No need to install any software. Share entire screen or a specific browser tab with this extension.

This screen sharing extension works with device management software VantageMDM. You must have VantageMDM account to use this extension. You can try it free by signing up at VantageMDM website. Once a device is enrolled into VantageMDM then this extension is automatically pushed to the device.
Sharing of screen is helpful for administrators to provide remote support. Once the device user clicks the share button on the extension, admin can view the screen by logging into VantageMDM account.
